body_html:
I opened an issue with Conda team and looks the issue of conda command not found in Env is introduced in 4.4 version and should be fixed in 4.5 (Next version). Until then we may need to link it directly or fully reference it as /opt/conda/bin/conda in the RUN Command. Alternatively, we could specify the Conda version as 4.3 that may not have this problem.

conda/conda#6938
conda/conda#6810

But I still get the error on Item 2, that I am not sure how to fix or if others are having similar issues using the Dockerfile.

body:
I opened an issue with Conda team and looks the issue of `conda` command not found in Env is introduced in 4.4 version and should be fixed in 4.5 (Next version).  Until then we may need to link it directly or fully reference it as `/opt/conda/bin/conda` in the RUN Command.  Alternatively, we could specify the Conda version as 4.3 that may not have this problem.

https://github.com/conda/conda/issues/6938
https://github.com/conda/conda/issues/6810

But I still get the error on Item 2, that I am not sure how to fix or if others are having similar issues using the Dockerfile.
